headline: PPL Corp. price target raised to $36 from $31 at Citi
summary: Citi analyst Ryan Levine raised the firm’s price target on PPL Corp. (PPL) to $36 from $31 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm says the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission could take grid-level actions to manage load, and it expects to see discussions around incentives for long-term power purchase agreements in the upcoming legislative session.
